id: Biden adopts German shepherd named Major
paragraph: By Sophie TatumUpdated 9:33 PM ET, Sat November 17, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)Former Vice President Joe Biden has a new four-legged addition to his family: a German shepherd named Major. CNN's Arlette Saenz contributed to this report.
